Language.comment: 语言文件，仅支持 utf8 编码的文件

Attribute.name: lang
Attribute.comment: 表明什么语言的描述字符串

Attribute.name: codepage
Attribute.comment: 语言代码页

Attribute.name: id
Attribute.comment: 字符串ID。txt%[str]txt，两侧的txt会被保留。

Attribute.name: text
Attribute.comment: 对应语言字符串

Attribute.name: source
Attribute.comment: XML布局文件

Attribute.name: count
Attribute.comment: 嵌入的次数

Attribute.name: style
Attribute.comment: true表示默认属性文件,false表示一般UI描述文件

Attribute.name: name
Attribute.comment: 字体名

Attribute.name: shared
Attribute.comment: 是否共享

Attribute.name: id
Attribute.comment: 字体索引，必须从0开始，否则采用默认字体

Attribute.name: size
Attribute.comment: 字体大小

Attribute.name: bold
Attribute.comment: 是否粗体

Attribute.name: italic
Attribute.comment: 是否斜体

Attribute.name: underline
Attribute.comment: 是否下划线

Attribute.name: default
Attribute.comment: 是否默认字体

Attribute.name: name
Attribute.comment: 控件名，如(Button)

Attribute.name: shared
Attribute.comment: 是否共享属性

Attribute.name: value
Attribute.comment: 控件默认属性

Attribute.name: shared
Attribute.comment: 是否共享

Attribute.name: file
Attribute.comment: 文件名

Attribute.name: res
Attribute.comment: 资源ID

Attribute.name: restype
Attribute.comment: 资源类型

Attribute.name: mask
Attribute.comment: 给不支持 alpha 通道的图片指定透明色

Attribute.name: hsl
Attribute.comment: 是否使用HSL模式

Attribute.name: size
Attribute.comment: 窗口的初始化大小,如(800,600)

Attribute.name: sizebox
Attribute.comment: 窗口可拖动改变窗口大小的边距,如(4,4,6,6)

Attribute.name: caption
Attribute.comment: 窗口可拖动的标题栏大小的边距,最后一个参数是指离上边框的距离,如(0,0,0,28)

Attribute.name: roundcorner
Attribute.comment: 窗口圆角大小,如(4,4)

Attribute.name: mininfo
Attribute.comment: 窗口最小大小,如(320,240)

Attribute.name: disabledfontcolor
Attribute.comment: 默认的disabled字体颜色,如(#FFA7A6AA)

Attribute.name: defaultfontcolor
Attribute.comment: 默认的字体颜色,如(#FF000000)

Attribute.name: linkfontcolor
Attribute.comment: 默认的link字体颜色,如(#FF0000FF)

Attribute.name: linkhoverfontcolor
Attribute.comment: 默认的linkhoverfont字体颜色,如(#FFD3215F)

Attribute.name: selectedcolor
Attribute.comment: 默认的selected字体颜色,如(#FFBAE4FF)

Attribute.name: showdirty
Attribute.comment: 绘制脏矩形(屏幕上更新的区域被称为脏矩形)

Attribute.name: noactivate
Attribute.comment: 是否允许激活，默认不允许

Attribute.name: opacity
Attribute.comment: 窗体透明度(0-255)，默认不透明

Attribute.name: layeredopacity
Attribute.comment: 分层窗体透明度(0-255)，默认不透明

Attribute.name: layered
Attribute.comment: 是否使用分层窗体，默认不使用。

Attribute.name: shape
Attribute.comment: 分层窗体背景图，默认无。

Attribute.name: shadowshow
Attribute.comment: 是否启用窗体阴影

Attribute.name: shadowsize
Attribute.comment: 算法阴影的宽度(-20到20),默认5

Attribute.name: shadowpos
Attribute.comment: 算法阴影的偏移量

Attribute.name: shadowcolor
Attribute.comment: 算法阴影的颜色，不支持透明度，使用shadowdarkness设置透明度

Attribute.name: shadowsharpness
Attribute.comment: 算法阴影的锐度(0~20)

Attribute.name: shadowdarkness
Attribute.comment: 算法阴影的深度(相当于透明度)

Attribute.name: shadowimage
Attribute.comment: 阴影图片，使用此属性后自动屏蔽算法阴影。支持 file|res|restype|corner/scale9 属性

Attribute.name: dropenable
Attribute.comment: 是否接受拖放（拖放目标）

Attribute.name: delayclick
Attribute.comment: 单击事件延迟发送，默认false。false系统默认特性，双击消息前会先发送单击消息；true会判断单击/双击消息，因此双击消息前不会有单击消息，单击消息会有一个双击的最大时间间隔。单击消息在首次弹起后发送；双击消息在第二次弹起后发送。

Attribute.name: focusedctrl
Attribute.comment: 窗体默认控件名字，如果不设置，duilib会把焦点设置到第一个支持焦点的控件上。

Control.notifies: setfocus killfocus timer menu windowinit(root) dblclick

Attribute.name: name
Attribute.comment: 控件名字，同一窗口内必须唯一，如(testbtn)

Attribute.name: pos
Attribute.comment: 位置，如果为float控件则指定位置和大小，否则只指定大小,如(0,0,100,100)

Attribute.name: margin
Attribute.comment: 外边距,如(2,2,2,2)。采用 IE 的盒子模型，控件宽/高包含边框+padding+content

Attribute.name: inset
Attribute.comment: 内边距,如(2,2,2,2)，已废弃，推荐使用padding

Attribute.name: padding
Attribute.comment: 内边距,如(2,2,2,2)，用于取代inset

Attribute.name: bkcolor
Attribute.comment: 背景颜色,如(#FFFF0000),使用bkcolor1取代

Attribute.name: bkcolor2
Attribute.comment: 背景渐变色2,和bkcolor配合使用,如(#FFFFFF00)

Attribute.name: bkcolor3
Attribute.comment: 背景渐变色3,和bkcolor、bkcolor2配合使用,如(#FFFF00FF)

Attribute.name: direction
Attribute.comment: 渐变方向。true/false分别表示水平/垂直

Attribute.name: colorhsl
Attribute.comment: 本控件的颜色是否随窗口的hsl变化而变化,如(false)

Attribute.name: bordercolor
Attribute.comment: 边框颜色,如(#FF000000)

Attribute.name: hotbordercolor
Attribute.comment: 鼠标悬停时边框颜色,如(#FF00F000)

Attribute.name: focusedbordercolor
Attribute.comment: 获得焦点时边框的颜色,如(#FFFF0000)

Attribute.name: selectedbordercolor
Attribute.comment: 选中状态时边框的颜色,如(#FFFF0000)

Attribute.name: bordersize
Attribute.comment: 可以设置INT或RECT类型的值。当值为INT时则左、上、右、下都用该值作为宽。值为RECT类型时则分别设置左、上、右、下的边框

Attribute.name: borderstyle
Attribute.comment: 边框样式的设置，可以组合多种样式，详见 PS_SOLID

Attribute.name: borderround
Attribute.comment: 边框圆角半径,如(2,2)

Attribute.name: bkimage
Attribute.comment: 背景图片,如(bk.bmp或file='aaa.jpg' res='' restype='' color='' dest='0,0,0,0' source='0,0,0,0' corner/scale9='0,0,0,0' mask='#FF0000' fade='255' hole='false' xtiled='false' ytiled='false' hsl='false')

Attribute.name: width
Attribute.comment: 控件预设的宽度，如(100)

Attribute.name: height
Attribute.comment: 控件预设的高度，如(30)

Attribute.name: minwidth
Attribute.comment: 控件的最小宽度，如(100)

Attribute.name: minheight
Attribute.comment: 控件的最小高度，如(30)

Attribute.name: maxwidth
Attribute.comment: 控件的最大宽度，如(100)

Attribute.name: maxheight
Attribute.comment: 控件的最大高度，如(30)

Attribute.name: text
Attribute.comment: 显示文本,如(测试文本)

Attribute.name: tooltip
Attribute.comment: 鼠标悬浮提示,如(请在这里输入你的密码)

Attribute.name: userdata
Attribute.comment: 自定义标识

Attribute.name: tag
Attribute.comment: 自定义数据。支持16进制写法(如0xF0)

Attribute.name: enabled
Attribute.comment: 是否可以响应用户操作,如(true)

Attribute.name: mouse
Attribute.comment: 本控件是否可以响应鼠标操作,如(true)

Attribute.name: visible
Attribute.comment: 是否可见,如(true)

Attribute.name: float
Attribute.comment: 是否使用绝对定位,如(true)。值true时需要pos属性指定位置；值为RECT时，按比例(double)指定位置与大小,与pos属性有叠加效果

Attribute.name: shortcut
Attribute.comment: 快捷键,如(CTRL+ALT+P)。CTRL[+SHIFT][+ALT]+字母;SHIFT+ALT+字母;ALT+字母;字母。编辑框快捷键可以在标签上提示。

Attribute.name: menu
Attribute.comment: 是否需要右键菜单,如(true)

Attribute.name: keyboard
Attribute.comment: 非CButtonUI类忽略该值，为false时不支持TAB_STOP,且该对象不处理键盘信息

Attribute.name: virtualwnd
Attribute.comment: 设置控件的虚拟窗体的名字

Attribute.name: cover
Attribute.comment: 是否遮罩

Attribute.name: weight
Attribute.comment: 权重。空间不足时优先显示权重大的控件。

Attribute.name: dropenable
Attribute.comment: 是否接受拖放（拖放目标）

Attribute.name: dragenable
Attribute.comment: 是否支持拖拽（拖放源），重写UIEVENT_MOUSEMOVE消息的控件，不支持本属性

Attribute.name: dragimage
Attribute.comment: 拖拽时显示的图片

Attribute.name: triggerenter
Attribute.comment: 鼠标移入特效。

Attribute.name: triggerleave
Attribute.comment: 鼠标移出特效。

Attribute.name: triggerclick
Attribute.comment: 鼠标单击特效。

Attribute.name: triggershow
Attribute.comment: 控件显示特效。

Attribute.name: triggerhide
Attribute.comment: 控件隐藏特效。

Container.notifies: setfocus killfocus timer menu windowinit(root) dblclick

Attribute.name: mousechild
Attribute.comment: 本控件的子控件是否可以响应用户操作,如(true)

Attribute.name: vscrollbar
Attribute.comment: 是否使用竖向滚动条,如(true)

Attribute.name: vscrollbarstyle
Attribute.comment: 垂直滚动条样式

Attribute.name: hscrollbar
Attribute.comment: 是否使用横向滚动条,如(true)

Attribute.name: hscrollbarstyle
Attribute.comment: 水平滚动条模式

Attribute.name: childmargin
Attribute.comment: 子控件之间的额外距离,如(4)

Attribute.name: childalign
Attribute.comment: 子控件水平对齐方式，取值left,center,right

Attribute.name: childvalign
Attribute.comment: 子控件垂直对齐方式，取值top,center,bottom

Attribute.name: autowidth
Attribute.comment: 是否自动计算宽度

Attribute.name: autoheight
Attribute.comment: 是否自动计算高度

ChildLayout.comment: 不推荐使用。可以用 Include 标签代替

Attribute.name: xmlfile
Attribute.comment: 子窗体XML布局文件

VerticalLayout.notifies: setfocus killfocus timer menu windowinit(root) dblclick

Attribute.name: sepheight
Attribute.comment: 分隔符高度,正负表示分隔符在顶部还是底部,如(4)

Attribute.name: sepimm
Attribute.comment: 拖动分隔符是否立即改变大小,如(false)

HorizontalLayout.notifies: setfocus killfocus timer menu windowinit(root) dblclick

Attribute.name: sepwidth
Attribute.comment: 分隔符宽,正负表示分隔符在左边还是右边,如(-4)

Attribute.name: sepimm
Attribute.comment: 拖动分隔符是否立即改变大小,如(false)

HWeightLayout.notifies: setfocus killfocus timer menu windowinit(root) dblclick

TileLayout.notifies: setfocus killfocus timer menu windowinit(root) dblclick

Attribute.name: columns
Attribute.comment: 列数,如(4)

Attribute.name: itemsize
Attribute.comment: 子项固定大小，如(128,128)

Attribute.name: childvmargin
Attribute.comment: 子控件之间垂直方向的额外距离，如（4）

Attribute.name: rows
Attribute.comment: 行数,如(4)

Attribute.name: childrounded
Attribute.comment: 子控件铺满整个控件，忽略itemsize属性

TabLayout.notifies: setfocus killfocus timer menu tabselect windowinit(root) dblclick

Attribute.name: selectedid
Attribute.comment: 默认选中的页面id,如(0)

ActiveX.notifies: setfocus killfocus timer menu showactivex windowinit(root)

Attribute.name: clsid
Attribute.comment: activex的clsid,如({8856F961-340A-11D0-A96B-00C04FD705A2})

Attribute.name: modulename
Attribute.comment: activex从指定位置加载,如(flash/flash.ocx)

Attribute.name: delaycreate
Attribute.comment: 是否需要延迟创建activex,如(false)

Flash.notifies: setfocus killfocus timer menu showactivex windowinit(root)

Attribute.name: wmode
Attribute.comment: 控件的窗口模式。Window窗口，Opaque影片不透明，Transparent影片透明。设置为透明时，背影色无效

Attribute.name: align
Attribute.comment: 影片对齐方式。LTRB 的组合，先后顺序不变

Attribute.name: movie
Attribute.comment: 影片的URL或相对资源目录的路径

Attribute.name: base
Attribute.comment: 指定所有影片相对路径的基地址。当影片与其它需要的其它文件不在同一目录时特别有用。默认为当前影片所在路径。

Attribute.name: scale
Attribute.comment: 影片缩放模式。ShowAll保持长宽比不变显示全部影片区域；NoBorder保持长宽比不变显示部分影片区域；ExactFit影片拉伸到整个控件区域

Attribute.name: homepage
Attribute.comment: 默认首页

Attribute.name: autonavi
Attribute.comment: 是否打开默认首页

Combo.notifies: setfocus killfocus timer menu dropdown itemselect windowinit(root) dblclick

Attribute.name: showtext
Attribute.comment: 是否显示文本

Attribute.name: normalimage
Attribute.comment: 普通状态图片

Attribute.name: hotimage
Attribute.comment: 鼠标悬浮的状态图片

Attribute.name: focusedimage
Attribute.comment: 获得焦点时的状态图片

Attribute.name: pushedimage
Attribute.comment: 鼠标按下的状态图片

Attribute.name: disabledimage
Attribute.comment: 禁用的状态图片

Attribute.name: dropbox
Attribute.comment: 弹出框样式

Attribute.name: dropboxsize
Attribute.comment: 弹出框大小设置

Attribute.name: itemheight
Attribute.comment: item高度，如（0）

Attribute.name: itemfont
Attribute.comment: item的字体id,如(0)

Attribute.name: itemalign
Attribute.comment: item对齐方式,取值left、right、center，如(center)

Attribute.name: itemendellipsis
Attribute.comment: item句末显示不全是否使用...代替,如(true)

Attribute.name: itemtextpadding
Attribute.comment: 废弃，请用itempadding。item文字显示的边距,如(2,2,2,2)

Attribute.name: itempadding
Attribute.comment: item文字显示的边距,如(2,2,2,2)，用于取代itemtextpadding

Attribute.name: itemtextcolor
Attribute.comment: item字体颜色，0表示使用默认字体颜色

Attribute.name: itembkcolor
Attribute.comment: item背景颜色

Attribute.name: itembkimage
Attribute.comment: item背景图片

Attribute.name: itemaltbk
Attribute.comment: item是否使用隔行交替背景

Attribute.name: itemselectedtextcolor
Attribute.comment: item被选中时的字体颜色，0表示使用默认字体颜色

Attribute.name: itemselectedbkcolor
Attribute.comment: item被选中时的背景颜色

Attribute.name: itemselectedimage
Attribute.comment: item被选中时的背景图片

Attribute.name: itemhottextcolor
Attribute.comment: item鼠标悬浮时的字体颜色，0表示使用默认字体颜色

Attribute.name: itemhotbkcolor
Attribute.comment: item鼠标悬浮时的背景颜色

Attribute.name: itemhotimage
Attribute.comment: item鼠标悬浮时的背景图片

Attribute.name: itemdisabledtextcolor
Attribute.comment: item禁用时的字体颜色，0表示使用默认字体颜色

Attribute.name: itemdisabledbkcolor
Attribute.comment: item禁用时的背景颜色

Attribute.name: itemdisabledimage
Attribute.comment: item禁用时的背景图片

Attribute.name: itemshowhtml
Attribute.comment: item是否使用类html富文本绘制,如(false)

Label.notifies: setfocus killfocus timer menu windowinit(root) dblclick

Attribute.name: align
Attribute.comment: 文字横向对齐方式,取值left、center、right

Attribute.name: valign
Attribute.comment: 文字纵向对齐方式,取值top、center、bottom

Attribute.name: endellipsis
Attribute.comment: 句末显示不全是否使用...代替,如(true)

Attribute.name: font
Attribute.comment: 字体id,如(0)

Attribute.name: textcolor
Attribute.comment: 字体颜色，0表示使用默认字体颜色,如(#FFFF0000)

Attribute.name: disabledtextcolor
Attribute.comment: disabled字体颜色，0表示使用默认disabled字体颜色,如(#FFFF0000)

Attribute.name: multiline
Attribute.comment: 是否使用多行,如(true)

Attribute.name: showhtml
Attribute.comment: 是否使用类html富文本绘制,如(false)

Attribute.name: autowidth
Attribute.comment: 是否自动计算宽度

Attribute.name: enabledeffect
Attribute.comment: 是否使用字体特效，使用下面文字特效属性必须该属性设置为true方有效

Attribute.name: enabledluminous
Attribute.comment: 是否使用发光字体特效

Attribute.name: luminousfuzzy
Attribute.comment: 发光强度，如3

Attribute.name: gradientangle
Attribute.comment: 渐变色渲染角度

Attribute.name: enabledstroke
Attribute.comment: 是否使用描边效果

Attribute.name: strokecolor
Attribute.comment: 字体描边的颜色

Attribute.name: enabledshadow
Attribute.comment: 是否使用阴影效果

Attribute.name: gradientlength
Attribute.comment: 渐变距离

Attribute.name: shadowoffset
Attribute.comment: 阴影偏移量和角度

Attribute.name: textcolor1
Attribute.comment: 字体渐变色

Attribute.name: textshadowcolora
Attribute.comment: 字体阴影渐变色

Attribute.name: textshadowcolorb
Attribute.comment: 字体阴影渐变色

Button.notifies: setfocus killfocus timer menu click windowinit(root) dblclick

Attribute.name: normalimage
Attribute.comment: 普通状态图片

Attribute.name: hotimage
Attribute.comment: 鼠标悬浮的状态图片

Attribute.name: focusedimage
Attribute.comment: 获得焦点时的状态图片

Attribute.name: pushedimage
Attribute.comment: 鼠标按下的状态图片

Attribute.name: disabledimage
Attribute.comment: 禁用的状态图片

Attribute.name: foreimage
Attribute.comment: 前景图片

Attribute.name: hotforeimage
Attribute.comment: 鼠标悬浮状态前景图片

Attribute.name: fivestatusimage
Attribute.comment: 5态图片，宽高相同，水平排列，顺序为：正常，按下，悬浮，焦点，禁用。

Attribute.name: fadedelta
Attribute.comment: 普通图片透明度变化步长

Attribute.name: disableseconds
Attribute.comment: 下次响应鼠标/键盘事件需要等待的秒数,[0,100]。默认0，表示关闭该特性。

Attribute.name: hotbkcolor
Attribute.comment: 鼠标悬浮状态背景色,0表示不使用此颜色,如(#FFFF0000)

Attribute.name: focusedbkcolor
Attribute.comment: 焦点状态背景颜色,0表示不使用此颜色,如(#FFFF0000)

Attribute.name: pushedbkcolor
Attribute.comment: 鼠标按下背景色,0表示不使用此颜色,如(#FFFF0000)

Attribute.name: disabledbkcolor
Attribute.comment: 禁用状态背景色,0表示不使用此颜色,如(#FFFF0000)

Attribute.name: hottextcolor
Attribute.comment: 鼠标悬浮字体颜色，0表示不使用此颜色,如(#FFFF0000)

Attribute.name: focusedtextcolor
Attribute.comment: 获得焦点字体颜色，0表示不使用此颜色,如(#FFFF0000)

Attribute.name: pushedtextcolor
Attribute.comment: 鼠标按下字体颜色，0表示不使用此颜色,如(#FFFF0000)

Option.notifies: setfocus killfocus timer menu click selectchanged windowinit(root) dblclick

Attribute.name: selectedimage
Attribute.comment: 选中的状态图片,弃用,由selnormalimage代替

Attribute.name: selectedhotimage
Attribute.comment: 选中+鼠标悬浮的状态图片,弃用,由selhotimage代替

Attribute.name: group
Attribute.comment: 所属组的名称，可不设

Attribute.name: selected
Attribute.comment: 是否选中

Attribute.name: foreimage
Attribute.comment: 前景图片

Attribute.name: selnormalimage
Attribute.comment: 选中正常状态图片,同selectedimage

Attribute.name: selhotimage
Attribute.comment: 选中鼠标悬浮图片,同selectedhotimage

Attribute.name: selfocusedimage
Attribute.comment: 选中焦点状态图片

Attribute.name: selpushedimage
Attribute.comment: 选中鼠标按下图片

Attribute.name: seldisabledimage
Attribute.comment: 选中禁用状态图片

Attribute.name: unselnormalimage
Attribute.comment: 未选中正常状态图片,等同Button相同状态的属性

Attribute.name: unselhotimage
Attribute.comment: 未选中鼠标悬浮图片,等同Button相同状态的属性

Attribute.name: unselfocusedimage
Attribute.comment: 未选中焦点状态图片,等同Button相同状态的属性

Attribute.name: unselpushedimage
Attribute.comment: 未选中鼠标按下图片,等同Button相同状态的属性

Attribute.name: unseldisabledimage
Attribute.comment: 未选中禁用状态图片,等同Button相同状态的属性

Attribute.name: seltextcolor
Attribute.comment: 选中/按下状态背景颜色，0表示不使用此颜色,如(#FFFF0000)

Attribute.name: selnormalbkcolor
Attribute.comment: 选中正常状态背景颜色，0表示不使用此颜色,如(#FFFF0000)

Attribute.name: selhotbkcolor
Attribute.comment: 选中+鼠标悬浮背景颜色，0表示不使用此颜色,如(#FFFF0000)

Attribute.name: selfocusedbkcolor
Attribute.comment: 选中+焦点背景颜色，0表示不使用此颜色,如(#FFFF0000)

Attribute.name: selpushedbkcolor
Attribute.comment: 选中+鼠标按下背景颜色，0表示不使用此颜色,如(#FFFF0000)

Attribute.name: seldisabledbkcolor
Attribute.comment: 选中+禁用背景颜色，0表示不使用此颜色,如(#FFFF0000)

Attribute.name: bindtablayout
Attribute.comment: TabLayout控件名

Attribute.name: bindtabindex
Attribute.comment: 单击后触发TabLayout页面的索引号

RadioBox.notifies: setfocus killfocus timer menu click selectchanged windowinit(root) dblclick

CheckBox.notifies: setfocus killfocus timer menu click selectchanged windowinit(root) dblclick

Attribute.name: seltext
Attribute.comment: 选中状态的文本。用于选中状态切换时自动改变显示文本。

Text.notifies: setfocus killfocus timer menu link windowinit(root) dblclick

Progress.notifies: setfocus killfocus timer menu windowinit(root) dblclick

Attribute.name: foreimage
Attribute.comment: 前景图片

Attribute.name: foredisabledimage
Attribute.comment: 前景禁用状态图片

Attribute.name: hor
Attribute.comment: 水平或垂直,如(true)

Attribute.name: min
Attribute.comment: 进度最小值，如(0)

Attribute.name: max
Attribute.comment: 进度最大值，如(100)

Attribute.name: value
Attribute.comment: 进度值，如(50)

Slider.notifies: setfocus killfocus timer menu valuechanged windowinit(root) dblclick

Attribute.name: thumbimage
Attribute.comment: 拖动滑块普通状态图片

Attribute.name: thumbhotimage
Attribute.comment: 拖动滑块鼠标悬浮状态图片

Attribute.name: thumbpushedimage
Attribute.comment: 拖动滑块鼠标按下状态图片

Attribute.name: thumbdisabledimage
Attribute.comment: 拖动滑块禁用状态图片

Attribute.name: thumbsize
Attribute.comment: 拖动滑块大小,如(10,10)

Attribute.name: step
Attribute.comment: 进度步长，如(1)

Attribute.name: imm
Attribute.comment: 在滑动过程中也发出消息

Edit.notifies: setfocus killfocus timer menu return textchanged windowinit(root)

Attribute.name: readonly
Attribute.comment: 是否只读,如(false)

Attribute.name: numberonly
Attribute.comment: 是否纯数字,>=0的整数,如(false)

Attribute.name: minmaxnumber
Attribute.comment: 数字最小最大值,如(0,6)

Attribute.name: password
Attribute.comment: 是否显示密码字符,如(false)

Attribute.name: autoselall
Attribute.comment: 是否自动全选,如(false)

Attribute.name: maxchar
Attribute.comment: 输入字符最大长度，如(100)

Attribute.name: normalimage
Attribute.comment: 普通状态图片

Attribute.name: hotimage
Attribute.comment: 鼠标悬浮状态图片

Attribute.name: focusedimage
Attribute.comment: 获得焦点状态图片

Attribute.name: disabledimage
Attribute.comment: 禁用状态图片

Attribute.name: tiptext
Attribute.comment: 默认提示信息,获取焦点或内容不空时消失

Attribute.name: tipcolor
Attribute.comment: 默认提示信息的颜色,如(#FFBAC0C5)
是否启用字符过滤；true白名单允许，false黑名单禁止；字符集，也可以调用成员函数设置。与numberonly/regexp属性互斥。
是否启用正则过滤；正则式，也可以调用成员函数设置，支持与Perl兼容的正则表达式基本语法。与numberonly/charfilter属性互斥。

Attribute.name: delaytxtchange
Attribute.comment: 默认0毫秒,表示编辑框内容更新立即通知；否则表示指定的毫秒数后通知用户。如果仅数字模式，在越界检查后产即发送通知。

Attribute.name: delayvalidate
Attribute.comment: 默认2000毫秒，数值越界检查超时时间。

Attribute.name: button1color
Attribute.comment: 左或上按钮普通状态颜色

Attribute.name: button1normalimage
Attribute.comment: 左或上按钮普通状态图片

Attribute.name: button1hotimage
Attribute.comment: 左或上按钮鼠标悬浮状态图片

Attribute.name: button1pushedimage
Attribute.comment: 左或上按钮鼠标按下状态图片

Attribute.name: button1disabledimage
Attribute.comment: 左或上按钮禁用状态图片

Attribute.name: button2color
Attribute.comment: 右或下按钮普通状态颜色

Attribute.name: button2normalimage
Attribute.comment: 右或下按钮普通状态图片

Attribute.name: button2hotimage
Attribute.comment: 右或下按钮鼠标悬浮状态图片

Attribute.name: button2pushedimage
Attribute.comment: 右或下按钮鼠标按下状态图片

Attribute.name: button2disabledimage
Attribute.comment: 右或下按钮禁用状态图片

Attribute.name: thumbcolor
Attribute.comment: 滑块普通状态颜色

Attribute.name: thumbnormalimage
Attribute.comment: 滑块普通状态图片

Attribute.name: thumbhotimage
Attribute.comment: 滑块鼠标悬浮状态图片

Attribute.name: thumbpushedimage
Attribute.comment: 滑块鼠标按下状态图片

Attribute.name: thumbdisabledimage
Attribute.comment: 滑块禁用状态图片

Attribute.name: railnormalimage
Attribute.comment: 滑块中间标识普通状态图片

Attribute.name: railhotimage
Attribute.comment: 滑块中间标识鼠标悬浮状态图片

Attribute.name: railpushedimage
Attribute.comment: 滑块中间标识鼠标按下状态图片

Attribute.name: raildisabledimage
Attribute.comment: 滑块中间标识禁用状态图片

Attribute.name: bknormalimage
Attribute.comment: 背景普通状态图片

Attribute.name: bkhotimage
Attribute.comment: 背景鼠标悬浮状态图片

Attribute.name: bkpushedimage
Attribute.comment: 背景鼠标按下状态图片

Attribute.name: bkdisabledimage
Attribute.comment: 背景禁用状态图片

Attribute.name: hor
Attribute.comment: 水平或垂直,如(true)

Attribute.name: linesize
Attribute.comment: 滚动一行的大小，如(8)

Attribute.name: range
Attribute.comment: 滚动范围，如(100)

Attribute.name: value
Attribute.comment: 滚动位置，如(0)

Attribute.name: showbutton1
Attribute.comment: 是否显示左或上按钮,如(true)

Attribute.name: showbutton2
Attribute.comment: 是否显示右或下按钮,如(true)

List.notifies: setfocus killfocus timer menu itemselect windowinit(root) dblclick

Attribute.name: vscrollbar
Attribute.comment: 是否使用竖向滚动条,如(true)

Attribute.name: hscrollbar
Attribute.comment: 是否使用横向滚动条,如(true)

Attribute.name: sepheight
Attribute.comment: 分隔符高度,正负表示分隔符在顶部还是底部,如(4)

Attribute.name: sepimm
Attribute.comment: 拖动分隔符是否立即改变大小,如(false)

Attribute.name: header
Attribute.comment: 是否显示表头,如(true)

Attribute.name: headerbkimage
Attribute.comment: 表头背景图片

Attribute.name: scrollselect
Attribute.comment: 是否随滚动改变选中项,如(false)

Attribute.name: multiexpanding
Attribute.comment: 是否支持多个item同时打开,如(false)

Attribute.name: itemheight
Attribute.comment: item高度，如（0）

Attribute.name: itemfont
Attribute.comment: item的字体id,如(0)

Attribute.name: itemalign
Attribute.comment: item对齐方式,取值left、right、center，如(center)

Attribute.name: itemvalign
Attribute.comment: item纵向对齐方式,取值top、center、bottom

Attribute.name: itemendellipsis
Attribute.comment: item句末显示不全是否使用...代替,如(true)

Attribute.name: itemmultiline
Attribute.comment: 是否支持多行文本,如(true)

Attribute.name: itemtextpadding
Attribute.comment: 废弃，请用itempadding。item文字显示的边距,如(2,2,2,2)

Attribute.name: itempadding
Attribute.comment: item文字显示的边距,如(2,2,2,2)，用于取代itemtextpadding

Attribute.name: itemtextcolor
Attribute.comment: item字体颜色，0表示使用默认字体颜色

Attribute.name: itembkcolor
Attribute.comment: item背景颜色

Attribute.name: itembkimage
Attribute.comment: item背景图片

Attribute.name: itemaltbk
Attribute.comment: item是否使用隔行交替背景

Attribute.name: itemselectedtextcolor
Attribute.comment: item被选中时的字体颜色，0表示使用默认字体颜色

Attribute.name: itemselectedbkcolor
Attribute.comment: item被选中时的背景颜色

Attribute.name: itemselectedimage
Attribute.comment: item被选中时的背景图片

Attribute.name: itemhottextcolor
Attribute.comment: item鼠标悬浮时的字体颜色，0表示使用默认字体颜色

Attribute.name: itemhotbkcolor
Attribute.comment: item鼠标悬浮时的背景颜色

Attribute.name: itemhotimage
Attribute.comment: item鼠标悬浮时的背景图片

Attribute.name: itemdisabledtextcolor
Attribute.comment: item禁用时的字体颜色，0表示使用默认字体颜色

Attribute.name: itemdisabledbkcolor
Attribute.comment: item禁用时的背景颜色

Attribute.name: itemdisabledimage
Attribute.comment: item禁用时的背景图片

Attribute.name: itemvlinecolor
Attribute.comment: item垂直分割线颜色

Attribute.name: itemhlinesize
Attribute.comment: item水平分割线宽度

Attribute.name: itemhlinecolor
Attribute.comment: item水平分割线颜色

Attribute.name: itemshowhtml
Attribute.comment: item是否使用类html富文本绘制,如(false)

Attribute.name: unselimage
Attribute.comment: 未选中状态图片，支持 Image 中的 file,res,restype 属性

Attribute.name: selimage
Attribute.comment: 选中状态图片，支持 Image 中的 file,res,restype 属性

Attribute.name: dragable
Attribute.comment: 是否可拖动改变大小,如(true)

Attribute.name: align
Attribute.comment: 文字对齐方式,取值left、right、cente，如(center)

Attribute.name: valign
Attribute.comment: item纵向对齐方式,取值top、center、bottom

Attribute.name: endellipsis
Attribute.comment: 句末显示不全是否使用...代替,如(true)

Attribute.name: multiline
Attribute.comment: 是否使用多行,如(true)

Attribute.name: font
Attribute.comment: 字体id,如(0)

Attribute.name: textcolor
Attribute.comment: 字体颜色，0表示使用默认字体颜色,如(#FFFF0000)

Attribute.name: showhtml
Attribute.comment: 是否使用类html富文本绘制,如(false)

Attribute.name: normalimage
Attribute.comment: 普通状态图片

Attribute.name: hotimage
Attribute.comment: 鼠标悬浮的状态图片

Attribute.name: focusedimage
Attribute.comment: 获得焦点时的状态图片

Attribute.name: pushedimage
Attribute.comment: 鼠标按下的状态图片

Attribute.name: sepimage
Attribute.comment: 拖动条图片

Attribute.name: sepwidth
Attribute.comment: 分隔符宽,如(4)

Attribute.name: sepcolor
Attribute.comment: 分隔符颜色,如(#FFF00F0F)

Attribute.name: sepimage
Attribute.comment: 分隔符图片

Attribute.name: editable
Attribute.comment: 是否支持可编辑,如(false)。双击显示编辑框。

Attribute.name: comboable
Attribute.comment: 是否支持下拉框,如(false)。双击显示下拉框。

Attribute.name: checkable
Attribute.comment: 是否支持复选框

Attribute.name: selected
Attribute.comment: 是否选中

Attribute.name: bkcolor
Attribute.comment: 是否使用自定义背景色

ListLabelElement.notifies: setfocus killfocus timer itemactivate itemclick windowinit(root)

ListTextElement.notifies: setfocus killfocus timer itemactivate itemclick link windowinit(root)

ListContainerElement.notifies: setfocus killfocus timer itemactivate itemclick itemexpanded itemcollapsed windowinit(root)

Attribute.name: selected
Attribute.comment: 是否选中,如(true)

Attribute.name: expandable
Attribute.comment: 是否可以展开,如(true)

ListHBoxElement.notifies: setfocus killfocus timer itemactivate itemclick itemexpanded itemcollapsed windowinit(root)

RichEdit.notifies: setfocus killfocus timer menu return windowinit(root)

Attribute.name: vscrollbar
Attribute.comment: 是否使用竖向滚动条,如(true)

Attribute.name: autovscroll
Attribute.comment: 是否随输入竖向滚动,如(true)

Attribute.name: hscrollbar
Attribute.comment: 是否使用横向滚动条,如(true)

Attribute.name: autohscroll
Attribute.comment: 是否随输入横向滚动,如(true)

Attribute.name: wanttab
Attribute.comment: 是否接受tab按键消息,如(true)

Attribute.name: wantreturn
Attribute.comment: 是否接受return按键消息,如(true)

Attribute.name: wantctrlreturn
Attribute.comment: 是否接受ctrl+return按键消息,如(true)

Attribute.name: transparent
Attribute.comment: 是否背景透明,如(true)

Attribute.name: rich
Attribute.comment: 是否使用富格式,如(true)

Attribute.name: multiline
Attribute.comment: 是否使用多行,如(true)

Attribute.name: readonly
Attribute.comment: 是否只读,如(false)

Attribute.name: password
Attribute.comment: 是否显示密码符,如(true)

Attribute.name: align
Attribute.comment: 文字对齐方式,取值left、right、cente，如(center)

Attribute.name: font
Attribute.comment: 字体id,如(0)

Attribute.name: textcolor
Attribute.comment: 字体颜色，0表示使用默认字体颜色，如(#FFFF0000)

Attribute.name: tiptext
Attribute.comment: 默认提示信息,内容不空时消失

Attribute.name: tipcolor
Attribute.comment: 默认提示信息的颜色,如(#FFBAC0C5)

TreeView.notifies: selectchanged setfocus killfocus timer menu itemselect windowinit(root) dblclick

Attribute.name: visiblefolderbtn
Attribute.comment: 是否显示展开与收缩按钮对象

Attribute.name: visiblecheckbtn
Attribute.comment: 是否显示复选框对象

Attribute.name: itemminwidth
Attribute.comment: 设置Item的最小宽度，当hscrollbar为真且itemminwidth大于TreeView宽度时才会显示横向滚动条

Attribute.name: itemtextcolor
Attribute.comment: item文本颜色，0表示使用默认字体颜色

Attribute.name: itemhottextcolor
Attribute.comment: 鼠标进入item时文本颜色，0表示使用默认字体颜色

Attribute.name: selitemtextcolor
Attribute.comment: item被选中时文本颜色，0表示使用默认字体颜色

Attribute.name: selitemhottextcolor
Attribute.comment: item被选中时且鼠标进入时的文本颜色，0表示使用默认字体颜色

TreeNode.notifies: setfocus killfocus timer itemactivate itemclick itemexpanded itemcollapsed windowinit(root)

Attribute.name: text
Attribute.comment: 显示文本,如(测试文本)

Attribute.name: horizattr
Attribute.comment: item虚线、复选框、展开与收缩、文本按钮等对象容器属性设置，格式参考Default元素的属性设置

Attribute.name: dotlineattr
Attribute.comment: item虚线对象属性设置，格式参考Default元素的属性设置

Attribute.name: folderattr
Attribute.comment: item展开与收缩按钮对象属性设置，格式参考Default元素的属性设置

Attribute.name: checkboxattr
Attribute.comment: item复选框对象属性设置，格式参考Default元素的属性设置

Attribute.name: itemattr
Attribute.comment: item按钮对象属性设置，格式参考Default元素的属性设置

Attribute.name: itemtextcolor
Attribute.comment: item文本颜色，0表示使用默认字体颜色

Attribute.name: itemhottextcolor
Attribute.comment: 鼠标进入item时文本颜色，0表示使用默认字体颜色

Attribute.name: selitemtextcolor
Attribute.comment: item被选中时文本颜色，0表示使用默认字体颜色

Attribute.name: selitemhottextcolor
Attribute.comment: item被选中时且鼠标进入时的文本颜色，0表示使用默认字体颜色

Attribute.name: bkimage
Attribute.comment: Gif动画图片路径(支持 file res restype mask属性)

Attribute.name: autoplay
Attribute.comment: 是否自动播放GIF动画

Attribute.name: autosize
Attribute.comment: 是否根据图片自动设置控件大小(开启后width和height属性失效)

Attribute.name: normalimage
Attribute.comment: 普通状态图片

Attribute.name: hotimage
Attribute.comment: 鼠标悬浮的状态图片

Attribute.name: focusedimage
Attribute.comment: 获得焦点时的状态图片

Attribute.name: disabledimage
Attribute.comment: 禁用状态图片

PwdCheck.notifies: setfocus killfocus timer menu windowinit(root) dblclick

Attribute.name: clrweak
Attribute.comment: 弱密码颜色

Attribute.name: clrmiddle
Attribute.comment: 中密码颜色

Attribute.name: clrstrong
Attribute.comment: 强密码颜色

Attribute.name: showtext
Attribute.comment: 是否显示文本

Attribute.name: text
Attribute.comment: 密码强度文本，不同强度用','分割。如'%[w],%[m],%[s]'

Attribute.name: pwd
Attribute.comment: 待检测强度的密码

Menu.notifies: setfocus killfocus timer menu itemselect windowinit(root)

Attribute.name: iconwidth
Attribute.comment: 菜单项左侧图标占用宽度

Attribute.name: iconnormal
Attribute.comment: 菜单项正常状态的图片

Attribute.name: iconchecked
Attribute.comment: 菜单项选中状态的图片

Attribute.name: checkable
Attribute.comment: 是否有复选功能

Attribute.name: checked
Attribute.comment: 是否被选中（前提是开启了复选功能，复选功能属性应该写在本属性的前面）

Attribute.name: expandwidth
Attribute.comment: 菜单项右侧图标占用宽度

Attribute.name: expandicon
Attribute.comment: 下级菜单小三角图片，仅当 expland 为 true 时有效

Attribute.name: line
Attribute.comment: 是否是分割线（开启后将不会显示图标）

Attribute.name: linecolor
Attribute.comment: 分割线的颜色

Attribute.name: height
Attribute.comment: 菜单项高度（分割线默认高度是6）

IPAddress.notifies: setfocus killfocus timer menu windowinit(root) dblclick

Attribute.name: readonly
Attribute.comment: 是否只读,如(false)
